fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Throw an extremely loud party at a player's house to celebrate being the best GIM faction.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - By throwing a party at a player's house, your target and their visitors will be distracted. Your target will be roleblocked, and their visitors have their ability fail, but the visit will still go through. In addition, the players directly adjacent to your target will fail to receive any night feedback.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take down the Town through various crimes.
